data.name: XMenu
desc: specifies a simple menu.

methods.name: addMenuListener
desc: adds the specified menu listener to receive events from this menu.

methods.name: clear
desc: removes all items from the menu.

methods.name: enableAutoMnemonics
desc: specifies whether mnemonics are automatically assigned to menu items, or not.

methods.name: enableItem
desc: enables or disables the menu item.

methods.name: getCommand
desc: retrieves the command string for the menu item.

methods.name: getHelpCommand
desc: retrieves the help command string for the menu item.

methods.name: getHelpText
desc: retrieves the help text for the menu item.

methods.name: getItemCount
desc: returns the number of items in the menu.

methods.name: getItemId
desc: returns the ID of the item at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemPos
desc: returns the position of the item with the specified ID.

methods.name: getItemText
desc: returns the string for the given item id.

methods.name: getItemType
desc: retrieves the type of the menu item.

methods.name: getPopupMenu
desc: returns the popup menu from the menu item.

methods.name: getTipHelpText
desc: retrieves the tip help text for the menu item.

methods.name: hideDisabledEntries
desc: specifies whether disabled menu entries should be hidden, or not.

methods.name: insertItem
desc: inserts an item into the menu.
The item is appended if the position is greater than or equal to getItemCount() or if it is negative.

methods.name: isItemEnabled
desc: returns the state of the menu item.

methods.name: isPopupMenu
desc: checks whether an XMenu is an XPopupMenu.

methods.name: removeItem
desc: removes one or more items from the menu.

methods.name: removeMenuListener
desc: removes the specified menu listener so that it no longer receives events from this menu.

methods.name: setCommand
desc: sets the command string for the menu item.

methods.name: setHelpCommand
desc: sets the help command string for the menu item.

methods.name: setHelpText
desc: sets the help text for the menu item.

methods.name: setItemText
desc: sets the text for the menu item.

methods.name: setPopupMenu
desc: sets the popup menu for a specified menu item.

methods.name: setTipHelpText
desc: sets the tip help text for the menu item.
